author: Cleo Abram
description:
I have a question… what if I just kept going away from Earth?

Imagine you fly off at the speed of light. After 8.3 minutes, you’d reach our Sun. After 4 hours and 6 minutes, you’d pass the furthest planet in our solar system.

How long do you think it takes you at the speed of light to get to the farthest object humans have ever sent? Subscribe if you think less than 24 hours.

But at 4 years in, just as you’re passing our nearest star… something weird happens…

If you like optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe for more of our show Huge If True!

#shorts #animation #farthest #science #technology #historyfacts
title: What If You Just Keep Going?
